name: The Yoyo of Zonk
description:
by kdx and Massena

The Yoyo of Zonk is a local multiplayer zelda-like, where one player controls the main character (Zonk), while the other player tries to kill the first using various traps and enemies (The Mind).

The dungeon is randomly generated every run. The game proposes three difficulties to balance the asymmetrical nature of the game.

For instructions and controls, please refer to our high-quality instruction booklet!

(Gamepad players, we recommend AntiMicroX to map gamepad keys to keyboard.)

This game may contain a dangerous level of memes, viewer discretion advised.
